https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jCb883Wdc87BxrEmoyT0ScW7reZ.jpg Three protagonists, one city, different backgrounds: Nour, India and Marwan pass each other but they never meet, though the effect of one incident will drastically alter their lives. Caught in a moment, their lives fall apart in just a matter of seconds. Blind Intersections
